item.title: Precious Life Elderly Care
item.description:
About Us

Precious Life Elderly Care provides compassionate and professional support for elderly, disabled, and mentally challenged individuals. Our dedicated team is trained to offer personalized care that enhances the quality of life for our clients, ensuring their comfort and dignity.

Our Services

  • Elderly Care: Professional care services for seniors
  • Disability Support: Specialized care for disabled individuals
  • Mental Health Care: Dedicated support for mentally challenged persons

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Michelle Yatali-Harridass
  • Phone: 332-4132
  • Email: michelleyatali@gmail.com

item.title: Rousillac Drug Mart/Avocat Pharm-Assist
item.description:
About Us

Rousillac Drug Mart/Avocat Pharm-Assist offers a comprehensive range of prescription and over-the-counter medications, alongside holistic health and wellness solutions. With a focus on customer care and CDAP services, we strive to enhance the health and well-being of our community.

Our Services

  • Prescription Medications: Full-service prescription medication dispensing
  • OTC Medications: Wide range of over-the-counter medications
  • Holistic Health Solutions: Natural and alternative health products
  • CDAP Services: Comprehensive CDAP medication services

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Tamara Benasrie
  • Phone: 480-2097
  • Email: rousillacdrugmart@gmail.com

item.title: DNA & Associates Ltd
item.description:
About Us

DNA & Associates Ltd. specializes in home care products and medical diagnostic equipment, offering a wide range of respiratory aids and hospital care products. They also provide supply and installation services for medical gas systems, ensuring quality and reliability in healthcare solutions.

Our Services

  • Home Care Products: Comprehensive range of products for home healthcare needs
  • Medical Diagnostic Equipment: State-of-the-art diagnostic equipment for healthcare facilities
  • Respiratory Aids: Equipment and supplies for respiratory care and support
  • Hospital Care Products: Essential supplies and equipment for hospital settings
  • Medical Gas Systems: Supply and professional installation of medical gas systems

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Angie Jairam
  • Phone: 221-6480 / 678-6661
  • Email: admin@dnatnt.com
  • Website: https://dnaltdtt.com
